summary: The diff shows that the Hindi spelling correction from 'वैशेलिया' to 'वैचेलिया' has been implemented in the translations.ts file. However, the diff does not provide evidence of actual changes to the Header.tsx and HomePage.tsx component files themselves, only file summaries describing their current state. Without seeing the actual code changes in these components, verification is incomplete.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update HomePage hero section to show 'वैचेलिया साइकोकेयर' in the main heading
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows a file summary for HomePage.tsx mentioning the hero section, but does not show the actual code changes. Cannot verify that the HomePage component was actually modified to use the corrected spelling from translations.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify no instances of the old spelling 'वैशेलिया' remain in the codebase
missing_requirements.reason: The diff is truncated and only shows 3 modified files. Without a complete codebase scan or grep results showing all instances of the old spelling have been removed, this acceptance criterion cannot be fully verified.
